```{r}
#Define the p-values for the two sets of genes

  1.39e-39, 1.96e-39, 2.52e-20, 4.42e-14, 0.526743847, 0.705011232, 1
)

  0, 0, 1.55e-185, 5.16e-158, 2.26e-50, 1.13e-34, 1.19e-16, 5.12e-15, 1.09e-14,
```
